help.title: Help & Support
help.feedbackAlert: Thank you for your interest! The feedback feature is coming soon.

howToUse.question: How to use the app?
howToUse.answer: Take a photo of your food or choose one from your gallery. Our AI will analyze the dish and show you calories and nutrients.

photoLimit.question: How many photos can I analyze?
photoLimit.answer: Free users can analyze up to 5 photos per day. Subscribers have unlimited access.

saveMeal.question: How do I save a meal?
saveMeal.answer: After analysis, tap "Save to Journal" to add the meal to your food diary.

editResults.question: Can I edit analysis results?
editResults.answer: Yes, you can tap on any ingredient to manually adjust its values.

aiAssistant.question: How does AI Assistant work?
aiAssistant.answer: AI Assistant provides personalized nutrition advice based on your profile and eating habits.

plans.finePrint: You can change plans or cancel anytime from Settings.

specialists.title: Talk to a real nutrition expert (coming soon)
specialists.shortDescription: Talk to a real nutrition expert (coming soon)
specialists.description: In the future, you'll be able to connect with certified nutritionists and dietitians for personalized advice and meal planning.

suggestedFood.title: Smart food suggestions
suggestedFood.trustText: Personal recommendations are formed based on your nutrition data over several days. The longer you use the app, the more accurate the advice.
suggestedFood.subtitle: Here are simple ideas to better match your goal for the next few days.
suggestedFood.shortDescription: Get simple ideas of what to eat today
suggestedFood.description: Personalized food suggestions based on your goals, preferences, and nutritional needs.
suggestedFood.empty: We don't have suggestions right now. Try adding a few meals first.

insufficientData.title: Not Enough Data
insufficientData.message: Add a few more meals to get personalized recommendations

error.generic: We couldn't load suggestions. We'll show some basic ideas instead.

protein.title: Protein sources
protein.subtitle: You're slightly under your protein target. Try adding 1–2 of these options daily.

cottageCheese.title: Low-fat cottage cheese
cottageCheese.description: 200 g of cottage cheese for breakfast or dinner is a simple and budget-friendly way to boost protein.

chickenBreast.title: Chicken breast
chickenBreast.description: Baked or boiled chicken breast works well with any side — rice, buckwheat, or vegetables.

eggs.title: Eggs
eggs.description: 2–3 eggs for breakfast, omelet or boiled, give a quick portion of protein and keep you full longer.

fiber.title: Fiber and slow carbs
fiber.subtitle: A bit more fiber will help with satiety and digestion.

oats.title: Oatmeal
oats.description: Oatmeal with a little fruit or berries is a simple breakfast that gives long-lasting energy.

vegetables.title: Vegetable side dishes
vegetables.description: Add fresh or cooked vegetables to lunch and dinner — start with 100–150 g per meal.

diary.analyzingHint: This may take up to a minute

mealHistory.emptySubtitle: Meals you log will appear here.

analysis.saveError: Failed to save meal. Please try again.
analysis.needsReviewMessage: We're not fully confident about this analysis. Please double-check and edit the values.

warning.suspiciousDescription: This analysis has data quality issues. Calories may not match macros, or energy density seems unusual. Please verify the results.

analysis.reanalyzeConfirmMessage: Re-analyze this dish from the original photo/text? Current edits will remain in history, but the new result may differ.
analysis.fixWithAiHint: Tap to ask AI to fix or improve this analysis
analysis.trustText: Analysis accuracy improves with each use — AI learns to recognize your favorite dishes and portion sizes.

describeFood.title: Describe your meal

planFeatures.limitedAnalyses: Up to 3 AI analyses per day

profile.aboutText1: EatSense is an AI-powered nutrition analysis app that helps you track your food intake and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
profile.aboutText2: Our advanced AI technology can identify ingredients and calculate nutritional values from photos of your meals.
profile.faq1q: How accurate is the AI analysis?
profile.faq1a: Our AI provides highly accurate nutritional analysis based on advanced machine learning models.
profile.faq2q: Can I edit the analysis results?
profile.faq2a: Yes, you can manually correct any analysis results to ensure accuracy.
profile.faq3a: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption to protect your personal data.

disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.intro: Before starting a consultation with an expert, please read and accept the following terms:
disclaimer.point1: Information provided by experts is for general guidance only and should not replace professional medical advice.
disclaimer.point2: Always consult with your doctor before making significant changes to your diet or health regimen.
disclaimer.point3: Your conversations are private. Do not share sensitive personal information beyond what is necessary.
disclaimer.point4: If you experience a medical emergency, contact emergency services immediately.
disclaimer.accept: I have read and accept these terms

success.title: Report Submitted
success.message: Thank you for your report. We will review it shortly.

block.title: Block User
block.subtitle: Stop receiving messages
block.warning:
Blocking this user will:

• Stop all messages from them
• Hide your profile from them
• End any active conversations

You can unblock users anytime in settings.

success.title: User Blocked
success.message: You will no longer receive messages from this user.

lifestyles.programAlreadyActive: You are already enrolled in this program.
lifestyles.startFailed: Failed to start program. Please try again later.

share.title: Share Your Style
share.textTemplate:
🌟 I chose the "{{name}}" lifestyle ✨

What about you? Discover your style in EatSense!

📲 https://eatsense.me/download
share.celebrationSubtitle: Tell your friends about your lifestyle

that_girl.name: That Girl
that_girl.subtitle: 5AM, green juice, main character energy
that_girl.description: Wellness as aesthetic. Green smoothies, matcha, overnight oats. Looking good, feeling good.
that_girl.shortDescription: 5AM routine, green juice, main character energy

clean_girl.name: Clean Girl
clean_girl.subtitle: Minimal, glowing, effortless beauty
clean_girl.description: The no-makeup makeup of eating. Whole foods, nothing processed, maximum hydration.

old_money.name: Old Money
old_money.subtitle: Quiet luxury, timeless elegance
old_money.description: Quality over everything. Grass-fed, wild-caught, organic, artisanal. No chain restaurants.

tomato_girl_summer.name: Tomato Girl Summer
tomato_girl_summer.subtitle: Mediterranean dreams, sun-kissed living
tomato_girl_summer.description: La dolce vita on your plate. Fresh tomatoes, burrata, olive oil, pasta, wine.

pilates_princess.name: Pilates Princess
pilates_princess.subtitle: Long, lean, graceful strength
pilates_princess.description: Fuel for lengthening and strengthening. Lean proteins, anti-inflammatory foods, collagen.

coastal_grandmother.name: Coastal Grandmother
coastal_grandmother.subtitle: Coastal kitchen energy
coastal_grandmother.description: Coastal living lifestyle. Fresh seafood, farmers market vegetables, white wine on the porch.

soft_life.name: Soft Life
soft_life.subtitle: Ease, comfort, zero stress
soft_life.description: Anti-hustle culture eating. Gentle foods, no strict rules, comfort without guilt.

mob_wife.name: Mob Wife
mob_wife.subtitle: Dramatic, luxurious, unapologetic
mob_wife.description: Italian-American indulgence. Sunday sauce, big family dinners, espresso, cannoli.

summer_shred.name: Summer Shred
summer_shred.subtitle: Lean, defined, beach-ready
summer_shred.description: Strategic fat loss while preserving muscle. High protein, plenty of vegetables.

metabolic_reset.name: Metabolic Reset
metabolic_reset.subtitle: Restart your fat-burning engine
metabolic_reset.description: Repair metabolism through whole foods, stable blood sugar, strategic eating windows.

sustainable_slim.name: Sustainable Slim
sustainable_slim.subtitle: Lose it and keep it off forever
sustainable_slim.description: Anti-yo-yo approach. Small sustainable changes, focus on habits not numbers.

lean_bulk.name: Lean Bulk
lean_bulk.subtitle: Build muscle without the fat
lean_bulk.description: Strategic surplus. Enough calories to grow, enough protein to build.

strength_athlete.name: Strength Athlete
strength_athlete.subtitle: Fuel for power and performance
strength_athlete.description: Performance nutrition for lifters. High protein, strategic carbs.

athletic_performance.name: Athletic Performance
athletic_performance.subtitle: Train hard, eat smart, perform better

functional_fitness.name: Functional Fitness
functional_fitness.subtitle: Strong, capable, ready for anything
functional_fitness.description: Nutrition for real-world performance. Balanced macros, anti-inflammatory focus.

glass_skin.subtitle: Korean beauty starts from inside
glass_skin.description: Gut-skin connection. Fermented foods, omega-3s, collagen.

anti_aging_glow.subtitle: Age gracefully, glow eternally
anti_aging_glow.description: Longevity nutrition. Antioxidants, collagen, healthy fats.

all_day_energy.subtitle: No crashes, no slumps, just go
all_day_energy.description: Blood sugar stability for sustained energy.

brain_fuel.subtitle: Focus, clarity, mental edge
brain_fuel.description: Nootropic nutrition. Omega-3s, stable glucose, brain nutrients.

okinawa_longevity.subtitle: Secrets of living to 100
okinawa_longevity.description: Blue Zone wisdom. Hara hachi bu — 80% full.

1950s_bombshell.subtitle: Curves, confidence, classic beauty
1950s_bombshell.description: Real food, real curves. Protein-rich, whole ingredients.

prima_ballerina.subtitle: Grace, discipline, elegant strength
prima_ballerina.description: Eating for performance and grace. Carbs for energy, protein for strength.

french_girl.subtitle: Je ne sais quoi in every bite
french_girl.description: Original intuitive eating. Three meals, no snacking, wine with dinner.

pin_up_retro.subtitle: Vintage curves, modern confidence
pin_up_retro.description: Home-cooked meals, whole ingredients, no guilt.

minimalist_zen.subtitle: Less clutter, more clarity
minimalist_zen.description: Japanese-inspired minimalism. Few ingredients, high quality.

spartan_warrior.subtitle: THIS. IS. DISCIPLINE.
spartan_warrior.description: Ancient warrior fuel. Simple foods, no luxury.

viking_raider.subtitle: Fuel for conquest and cold
viking_raider.description: Norse fuel. High fat, high protein, fermented foods.

navy_seal.subtitle: Elite fuel for elite performance
navy_seal.description: Performance nutrition, no nonsense. High calories for high output.

mma_fighter.subtitle: Cut weight, stay strong, dominate
mma_fighter.description: Fight camp nutrition. High protein, strategic carbs.

ceo_warrior.subtitle: Dominate the boardroom
ceo_warrior.description: Biohacker meets executive. IF, keto principles.

stoic_monk.subtitle: Master your body, master your mind
stoic_monk.description: Voluntary simplicity. Eat little, want nothing.

summer_beach_body.subtitle: 4 weeks to your most confident summer
summer_beach_body.description: Light, clean eating for beach confidence.

wedding_ready.subtitle: Glowing, confident, picture-perfect
wedding_ready.description: Gradual, sustainable approach for your special day.

holiday_balance.subtitle: Enjoy the season without regret
holiday_balance.description: Navigate holidays without gaining or restricting.

hot_girl_walk.name: Hot Girl Walk
hot_girl_walk.subtitle: Walk, reflect, glow
hot_girl_walk.description: Daily walks for mood and movement. Simple, sustainable, no gym required.

lazy_girl_weight_loss.name: Lazy Girl Weight Loss
lazy_girl_weight_loss.subtitle: Minimal effort, maximum results
lazy_girl_weight_loss.description: Low-effort habits for sustainable weight loss. No strict diets, no punishing workouts.

high_energy.name: High Energy
high_energy.subtitle: Fuel up, perform, thrive
high_energy.description: Nutrition for all-day energy. Balanced meals, smart carbs, no crashes.

mediterranean.name: Mediterranean
mediterranean.description: A heart-healthy eating plan based on traditional cuisine of Mediterranean countries. Rich in vegetables, fruits, whole grains, and olive oil.
mediterranean.shortDescription: Heart-healthy diet rich in olive oil, fish, and vegetables

dash.name: DASH
dash.description: Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension. Focuses on fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean proteins while limiting sodium.
dash.shortDescription: Heart-healthy diet to lower blood pressure

mind.name: MIND
mind.description: Mediterranean-DASH Intervention for Neurodegenerative Delay. Combines Mediterranean and DASH with emphasis on brain-healthy foods.
mind.shortDescription: Diet for brain health and cognitive function

flexitarian.name: Flexitarian
flexitarian.description: A flexible approach to vegetarian eating. Primarily plant-based with occasional meat.
flexitarian.shortDescription: Flexible plant-based eating with occasional meat

nordic.name: Nordic
nordic.description: Based on traditional Scandinavian cuisine. Emphasizes local, seasonal foods.

plate-method.name: Plate Method
plate-method.description: Simple visual guide: half plate vegetables, quarter protein, quarter carbs. Perfect for beginners.
plate-method.shortDescription: Simple plate division for balanced meals

if-14-10.name: 14:10 Eating Window
if-14-10.description: A gentler approach to intermittent fasting. Fast for 14 hours, eat within a 10-hour window.

if-16-8.name: 16:8 Eating Window
if-16-8.description: Classic intermittent fasting. Fast for 16 hours, eat within an 8-hour window.

high-protein-cut.name: High-Protein Cut
high-protein-cut.description: High protein intake for preserving muscle while cutting fat. Popular with athletes.
high-protein-cut.shortDescription: High protein for fat loss while preserving muscle

low-carb.name: Low-Carb
low-carb.description: Reduces carbohydrates, especially refined ones. Focus on protein and vegetables.
low-carb.shortDescription: Reduce carbs, focus on protein and vegetables

keto.name: Keto
keto.description: Very low-carb, high-fat diet that puts body into ketosis. Requires medical supervision for many people.
keto.shortDescription: Very low-carb for ketosis — requires caution

low-fodmap.name: Low-FODMAP (Gut)
low-fodmap.description: Elimination diet for IBS and digestive issues. Must be done in phases with professional guidance.
low-fodmap.shortDescription: Gut-healing diet in phases — requires guidance

gluten-free.name: Gluten-Free
gluten-free.description: Essential for celiac disease and gluten sensitivity. Not necessary as a lifestyle choice without medical indication.
gluten-free.shortDescription: For celiac disease or gluten sensitivity

roman-inspired.name: Roman-Inspired
roman-inspired.description: Inspired by ancient Roman diet. Focus on grains, legumes, olive oil, and vegetables. Historical reconstruction for fun.

spartan-inspired.name: Spartan-Inspired
spartan-inspired.description: Inspired by Spartan simplicity. Focus on simple, unprocessed foods and discipline.

arctic-inspired.name: Arctic-Inspired
arctic-inspired.description: Adapted from traditional Inuit diet. Focus on fish, omega-3, and seasonal produce.

steppe-inspired.name: Steppe-Inspired
steppe-inspired.description: Adapted from Mongolian steppe traditions. Focus on protein and fermented dairy.
steppe-inspired.shortDescription: Protein and fermented foods, steppe style

three-sisters.name: Three Sisters
three-sisters.description: Based on Native American "Three Sisters" agriculture. Corn, beans, and squash as dietary foundation.

okinawa_longevity.name: Okinawa Longevity
okinawa_longevity.description: Based on the traditional diet of Okinawa, Japan, known for the long lifespan of its inhabitants. Emphasizes plant-based foods, fish, sweet potatoes, and moderate calorie restriction.

paleo.name: Paleo
paleo.description: A whole-food approach with minimal processing. Emphasizes meat, fish, vegetables, fruits, nuts, and seeds.
paleo.shortDescription: Whole foods, no grains or dairy

whole30-inspired.name: Whole30 (Inspired)
whole30-inspired.description: A short reset protocol with strict rules. Eliminates sugar, alcohol, and common triggers for 30 days.

vegan-balanced.name: Vegan (Balanced)
vegan-balanced.description: Balanced plant-based eating with focus on adequate protein, B12, and other nutrients.

clean-eating.name: Clean Eating (Simple)
clean-eating.description: Simple approach: focus on whole foods and home cooking, minimize processed foods.

iifym.name: Flexible Dieting (IIFYM)
iifym.description: If It Fits Your Macros — flexible approach focusing on hitting daily calorie and macro targets.
iifym.shortDescription: Hit your macros, flexible food choices

roman-commoner.name: Roman Commoner (Inspired)
roman-commoner.description: Inspired by the diet of common Roman citizens. Simple grains, legumes, vegetables with occasional fish or cheese.

roman-elite.name: Roman Elite (Inspired)
roman-elite.description: Inspired by wealthier Roman diets. More variety with fish, meat, various appetizers, and fruits.

napoleon-soldier.name: Napoleon (Soldier-Style, Inspired)
napoleon-soldier.description: Inspired by Napoleonic era soldier rations. Hearty soups, bread, and simple protein.

on-set-day.name: On-Set Day (Inspired)
on-set-day.description: A public-figure-inspired template without naming individuals. Structured eating focused on protein and vegetables.

ramadan.name: Ramadan Fasting
ramadan.description: Guidance for healthy eating during Ramadan fasting period. Focus on balanced suhoor and iftar meals with proper hydration.

great-lent.name: Great Lent (Orthodox)
great-lent.description: Guidance for the Orthodox Great Lent fasting period with plant-based meals. A spiritual journey through mindful eating.

summer-detox.name: Summer Fresh
summer-detox.description: Seasonal eating focused on fresh fruits, vegetables, and light meals perfect for hot summer days.

navruz.name: Navruz Spring
navruz.description: A celebration of spring equinox with traditional Central Asian foods. Fresh greens, dairy, and symbolic dishes for renewal.

winter-warmth.name: Winter Warmth
winter-warmth.description: Hearty, warming meals to keep you energized through winter. Focus on soups, stews, root vegetables, and immune-supporting foods.

autumn-harvest.name: Autumn Harvest
autumn-harvest.description: Embrace autumn with pumpkins, apples, squash, and other fall favorites. Transition from summer lightness to winter warmth.

clean-girl.name: Clean Girl Aesthetic
clean-girl.description: A clean eating approach inspired by the clean girl aesthetic trend. Focus on simple, whole foods for glowing skin and natural energy.
clean-girl.shortDescription: Simple, clean eating for natural glow

vacation-vibes.name: Vacation Vibes
vacation-vibes.description: Balanced eating inspired by Mediterranean vacation style — fresh, colorful, enjoyable. No stress, just pleasure.

old-money.name: Old Money Classic
old-money.description: Refined eating habits inspired by classic elegance — quality over quantity, proper portions, timeless foods.

country-club-breakfast.name: Country Club Breakfast
country-club-breakfast.description: Morning rituals inspired by country club traditions. Proper breakfast as the foundation of a refined day.

sunday-brunch.name: Sunday Brunch
sunday-brunch.description: The art of leisurely Sunday brunch — late morning, good company, quality food, no rush.

yacht-week.name: Yacht Week
yacht-week.description: Eating inspired by yacht lifestyle — light, fresh, Mediterranean-influenced, always elegant.

prep-school-lunch.name: Prep School Lunch
prep-school-lunch.description: Inspired by traditional prep school dining — balanced, nutritious, proper. No skipping meals, no junk food.

french-chic.name: French Girl Diet
french-chic.description: French approach to eating — quality portions, enjoyment, no strict restrictions, natural balance and pleasure.

gatsby-twenties.name: 1920s Gatsby
gatsby-twenties.description: Inspired by the roaring twenties — glamorous parties, elegant appetizers, champagne, and indulgent but refined tastes.

fifties-hollywood.name: 1950s Hollywood
fifties-hollywood.description: Inspired by 1950s Hollywood glamour — balanced, portion-conscious, always camera-ready but enjoying life.

sixties-twiggy.name: 1960s Mod
sixties-twiggy.description: Inspired by 1960s mod culture — light, youthful, colorful, breaking traditional rules while staying elegant.

seventies-disco.name: 1970s Disco
seventies-disco.description: Inspired by Studio 54 era — light eating to stay energized for parties, quick bites, champagne, staying slim for dance floor.

eighties-power.name: 1980s Power Lunch
eighties-power.description: Inspired by 1980s corporate culture — power lunches, steak houses, business over meals, confident choices.

paywall.title: Unlock Full Access
paywall.subtitle: Get the most out of EatSense
paywall.finePrint: Cancel anytime. You won't be charged during the trial period.

description.title: 2. Service Description

registration.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
registration.title: 3. Registration and Account

userContent.content: You retain ownership of the content you upload. By uploading content, you grant us a license to use it to provide the service and improve the application.
